selectors.contactSubject: form[method='POST'] input[name='subject'], form[action*='contact'] input[name='subject'], form[action*='inquiry'] input[name='subject']
selectors.contactMessage: form[method='POST'] textarea[name='message'], form[action*='contact'] textarea[name='message'], form[action*='inquiry'] textarea[name='message']
selectors.contactSubmit: form[method='POST'] button.button.is-link, form[action*='contact'] button[type='submit'], form[action*='inquiry'] button[type='submit']
